00051 //
00052 //! Renvoie la valeur en un point.
00053 DoubleVect& Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_a(const DoubleVect& positions,
00054                                        DoubleTab& tab_valeurs) const
00055 {
00056   Cerr << "On passe dans Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_a(const DoubleVect& positions,DoubleTab& valeurs) " << finl;
00057   const Zone& la_zone = mon_domaine->zone(0);
00058   IntVect le_poly(1);
00059   la_zone.chercher_elements(positions,le_poly);
00060   DoubleTab positions2;
00061   positions2=positions;
00062   return valeur_aux_elems(positions2,le_poly[0],tab_valeurs);
00063 }
00064 
00065 DoubleVect& Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_a(const DoubleVect& positions,
00066                                        DoubleVect& tab_valeurs) const
00067 {
00068   Cerr << "On passe dans Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_a(const DoubleVect& positions,DoubleVect& valeurs) " << finl;
00069   assert(0);
00070   Cerr << "Il ne vaudrait mieux pas appeler Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_a avec Valeur DoubleVect" << finl;
00071   exit();
00072   return tab_valeurs;
00073 }

00076 //
00077 //
00078 DoubleVect& Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_a(const DoubleVect& positions,
00079                                        DoubleVect& val,
00080                                        int ncomp) const
00081 {
00082   if (ncomp > nb_compo_)
00083     {
00084       Cerr << "Erreur TRUST dans Champ_Don_lu::valeur_a()" << finl;
00085       Cerr << "l'entier ncomp est superieur au nombre de composantes du champ" << finl;
00086       exit();
00087     }
00088 
00089 // const DoubleTab& ch = valeurs();
00090 
00091 // a coder
00092   assert(0);
00093 
00094   return val;
00095 }

00102                                        int le_poly, int ncomp) const
00103 {
00104 // a coder
00105   assert(0);
00106   throw;
00107   return valeur_a(positions, tab_valeurs, le_poly, ncomp);

00110 //
00111 //
00112 DoubleTab& Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_aux(const DoubleTab& positions,
00113                                         DoubleTab& val) const
00114 {
00115   const Zone& la_zone = mon_domaine->zone(0);
00116 // B.M.: IntVect obligatoire pour l'instant a cause du prototype de valeur_aux_elems
00117   IntVect les_polys(la_zone.nb_elem());
00118   la_zone.chercher_elements(positions,les_polys);
00119   return valeur_aux_elems(positions,les_polys,val);
00120 }

00123 //
00124 //
00125 DoubleVect& Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_aux_compo(const DoubleTab& positions,
00126                                                DoubleVect& tab_valeurs, int ncomp) const
00127 {
00128   const Zone& la_zone = mon_domaine->zone(0);
00129 // B.M.: IntVect obligatoire pour l'instant a cause du prototype de valeur_aux_elems
00130   IntVect les_polys(la_zone.nb_elem());
00131   Cerr << "Nb elem : " << la_zone.nb_elem() << finl;
00132   Cerr << "Lespolys : " << les_polys.size_array() << finl;
00133   la_zone.chercher_elements(positions,les_polys);
00134   Cerr << "Nb elem : " << la_zone.nb_elem() << finl;
00135   Cerr << "Lespolys : " << les_polys.size_array() << finl;
00136   return valeur_aux_elems_compo(positions,les_polys,tab_valeurs,ncomp);
00137 }

00141 //
00142 //
00143 DoubleTab& Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_aux_elems(const DoubleTab& positions,
00144                                               const IntVect& les_polys,
00145                                               DoubleTab& val) const
00146 {
00147   if (val.nb_dim() == 2)
00148     {
00149       assert(val.dimension(0) == les_polys.size_array());
00150       assert(val.dimension(1) == nb_compo_);
00151     }
00152   else
00153     {
00154       Cerr << "Erreur TRUST dans Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_aux_elems()" << finl;
00155       Cerr << "Le DoubleTab val n'a pas 2 entrees" << finl;
00156       exit();
00157     }
00158   const DoubleTab& coord=mon_domaine->coord_sommets();
00159   const Zone& zone=mon_domaine->zone(0);
00160   int le_poly;
00161 
00162 
00163   {
00164     const DoubleTab& ch = valeurs();
00165 
00166     for(int rang_poly=0; rang_poly<les_polys.size_array(); rang_poly++)
00167       {
00168         le_poly=les_polys(rang_poly);
00169         if (le_poly == -1)
00170           for(int ncomp=0; ncomp<nb_compo_; ncomp++)
00171             val(rang_poly, ncomp) = 0;
00172         else
00173           {
00174             for(int ncomp=0; ncomp<nb_compo_; ncomp++)
00175               {
00176                 int som1=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 0 );
00177                 int som2=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 1 );
00178                 int som3=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 2 );
00179                 int som4=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 3 );
00180                 int som5=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 4 );
00181                 int som6=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 5 );
00182                 int som7=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 6 );
00183                 int som8=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 7 );
00184 
00185                 double xmin=coord(som1,0);
00186                 double xmax=coord(som2,0);
00187                 double ymin=coord(som1,1);
00188                 double ymax=coord(som3,1);
00189                 double zmin=coord(som1,2);
00190                 double zmax=coord(som5,2);
00191 
00192                 double hx=xmax - xmin;
00193                 double hy=ymax - ymin;
00194                 double hh=zmax - zmin;
00195 
00196                 val(rang_poly, ncomp) =
00197                   ch(som1,ncomp)*(xmax-positions(rang_poly,0))
00198                   *(ymax-positions(rang_poly,1))*(zmax-positions(rang_poly,2));
00199 
00200                 val(rang_poly, ncomp) +=ch(som2,ncomp)*(positions(rang_poly,0)-xmin)
00201                                         *(ymax-positions(rang_poly,1))*(zmax-positions(rang_poly,2));
00202 
00203                 val(rang_poly, ncomp) +=ch(som3,ncomp)*(xmax-positions(rang_poly,0))
00204                                         *(positions(rang_poly,1)-ymin)*(zmax-positions(rang_poly,2));
00205 
00206                 val(rang_poly, ncomp) +=ch(som4,ncomp)*(positions(rang_poly,0)-xmin)
00207                                         *(positions(rang_poly,1)-ymin)*(zmax-positions(rang_poly,2));
00208 
00209 
00210                 val(rang_poly, ncomp) += ch(som5,ncomp)*(xmax-positions(rang_poly,0))
00211                                          *(ymax-positions(rang_poly,1))*(positions(rang_poly,2)-zmin);
00212 
00213                 val(rang_poly, ncomp) +=ch(som6,ncomp)*(positions(rang_poly,0)-xmin)
00214                                         *(ymax-positions(rang_poly,1))*(positions(rang_poly,2)-zmin);
00215 
00216                 val(rang_poly, ncomp) +=ch(som7,ncomp)*(xmax-positions(rang_poly,0))
00217                                         *(positions(rang_poly,1)-ymin)*(positions(rang_poly,2)-zmin);
00218 
00219                 val(rang_poly, ncomp) +=ch(som8,ncomp)*(positions(rang_poly,0)-xmin)
00220                                         *(positions(rang_poly,1)-ymin)*(positions(rang_poly,2)-zmin);
00221 
00222                 val(rang_poly, ncomp)/=(hx*hy*hh);
00223 
00224               }
00225           }
00226       }
00227   }
00228 
00229   return val;
00230 }
00231 
00232 //
00233 //
00234 DoubleVect& Champ_som_lu_VDF::valeur_aux_elems_compo(const DoubleTab& positions,
00235                                                      const IntVect& les_polys,
00236                                                      DoubleVect& val,
00237                                                      int ncomp) const
00238 {
00239   assert(val.size() == les_polys.size_array());
00240   const DoubleTab& coord=mon_domaine->coord_sommets();
00241   const Zone& zone=mon_domaine->zone(0);
00242   int le_poly;
00243 
00244   const DoubleTab& ch = valeurs();
00245 
00246   for(int rang_poly=0; rang_poly<les_polys.size_array(); rang_poly++)
00247     {
00248       le_poly=les_polys(rang_poly);
00249       if (le_poly == -1)
00250         val(rang_poly) = 0;
00251       else
00252         {
00253           int som1=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 0 );
00254           int som2=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 1 );
00255           int som3=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 2 );
00256           int som4=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 3 );
00257           int som5=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 4 );
00258           int som6=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 5 );
00259           int som7=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 6 );
00260           int som8=zone.sommet_elem(le_poly , 7 );
00261 
00262           double xmin=coord(som1,0);
00263           double xmax=coord(som2,0);
00264           double ymin=coord(som1,1);
00265           double ymax=coord(som3,1);
00266           double zmin=coord(som1,2);
00267           double zmax=coord(som5,2);
00268 
00269           double hx=xmax - xmin;
00270           double hy=ymax - ymin;
00271           double hh=zmax - zmin;
00272 
00273           val(rang_poly) =
00274             ch(som1,ncomp)*(xmax-positions(rang_poly,0))
00275             *(ymax-positions(rang_poly,1))*(zmax-positions(rang_poly,2));
00276 
00277           val(rang_poly) +=ch(som2,ncomp)*(positions(rang_poly,0)-xmin)
00278                            *(ymax-positions(rang_poly,1))*(zmax-positions(rang_poly,2));
00279 
00280           val(rang_poly) +=ch(som3,ncomp)*(xmax-positions(rang_poly,0))
00281                            *(positions(rang_poly,1)-ymin)*(zmax-positions(rang_poly,2));
00282 
00283           val(rang_poly) +=ch(som4,ncomp)*(positions(rang_poly,0)-xmin)
00284                            *(positions(rang_poly,1)-ymin)*(zmax-positions(rang_poly,2));
00285 
00286 
00287           val(rang_poly) += ch(som5,ncomp)*(xmax-positions(rang_poly,0))
00288                             *(ymax-positions(rang_poly,1))*(positions(rang_poly,2)-zmin);
00289 
00290           val(rang_poly) +=ch(som6,ncomp)*(positions(rang_poly,0)-xmin)
00291                            *(ymax-positions(rang_poly,1))*(positions(rang_poly,2)-zmin);
00292 
00293           val(rang_poly) +=ch(som7,ncomp)*(xmax-positions(rang_poly,0))
00294                            *(positions(rang_poly,1)-ymin)*(positions(rang_poly,2)-zmin);
00295 
00296           val(rang_poly) +=ch(som8,ncomp)*(positions(rang_poly,0)-xmin)
00297                            *(positions(rang_poly,1)-ymin)*(positions(rang_poly,2)-zmin);
00298 
00299           val(rang_poly)/=(hx*hy*hh);
00300 
00301         }
00302     }
00303   return val;
00304 }
